name: Ehub Dashboard
description:
Creation of Entertainment hub's official dashboard for staffs only.
This is to enable the team have their own customised central point of information.

name: Ehub Offical Site
description:
Entertainment hub's official website for world wide web.
For this project, it is going to be a large scale project and will take longer time than we might expect
. Eventually this will be done. This particular project will be opened to the public.

name: Zoom-Patch
description:
Dispatch Service owned by Ehub. This isn't just any dispatch service, rather it's a dispatch service that can be used to transport live stock and goods.
For this recruiters will be needed, therefore solving the need of employment withing calabar, Nigeria
